original_title: Stephen K. Amos: Find the Funny
overview: Stand-up circuit stalwart and panel-show favourite, Stephen K. Amos presents his first DVD, FIND THE FUNNY. Filmed before a live audience, Stephen demonstrates the wit, charm and 'feelgood' humour that have seen him storm the Edinburgh Festival every year since his 2001 debut.
title: Stephen K. Amos: Find the Funny
